name: GorgoN ChambeR
description:
It begins where it begins.

+++ STORY +++

June 12th, 2019, Wave 80

It's a summer's day like any other. Heat is unbearable, cicadas loud as static, and there was a surprise snow storm the other day because the weather's nuts.

I'm gonna be super busy today, but hopefully, today's the day I can confess to a boy I like! He'll probably say no, but hey, no point in running when you're scared!

What could go wrong?

+++ FEATURES +++

  • Linear, short story full of twists and turns.
  • Combined 3D, photographed, and hand-drawn graphics into one package.
  • Varied techno and instrumental soundtrack.
